title: I plug headphones into my google pixel the phone lowers the volume on its own why?
content:
Out of nowhere whenever I plug headphones into my google pixel the phone lowers the volume on its own. I'm not pressing anything and buttons are not stuck. If I try and bring the volume back.up once this happens it goes back down. Sometimes the Google assistant thing opens up too on its own when the volume goes down. 
I have done numerous restarts. Can anyone help?
I've restarted multiple times. I've unplugged and plugged headphones. I've checked settings and updates.
